Articles.Content:
Hello there! After 4 years of playing KSP, I've finally decided to sign up for the forums, mostly because of Kethane Station, so I'm exited to see what I've been missing all these years. 
I've taken a liking towards challenges, so if you got any good ones, throw 'em at me!

Well, hello back from Brazil!

As a 4-year veteran, you probably don't need help, but if you want to spread the word around you might be interested in this:

it's a work-in-progress, but hey!
I'll make sure to tell some more experienced polish speakers that I know 'bout this. Thanks for showin me this!

hello

you might know more then me and dundun92(my brother) we have been playing ksp since the 0.20 days

Edited July 21, 2017 by Guest
